question: Now that Virginia has its own state-based marketplace, where do I sign-up for health coverage?
text:
Now that Virginia has its own state-based marketplace, where do I sign-up for health coverage?
          
        
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace provides a straight-forward, supportive and easy path to signing up for health coverage.  Simply go to
www.marketplace.virginia.gov
and locate the big, yellow box at the top right corner that says Get Covered.  Thats where it all it starts! There you can complete your application, shop for plans, and enroll in the coverage that is right for you and your family. You can also browse the plans available to you in your area before you start the application process, if you want to better understand your options first.
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace has great resources for you to learn more about Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, how to shop for plans, understanding the basics, educational videos, FAQs and more.  Before you Get Covered you may want to explore what Virginia's Insurance Marketplace has to offer.  Either way, Virginia's Insurance Marketplace gives you control, flexibility, clarity and greater understanding of your health coverage.
